About Me
Hello! I'm Vincent, an aspiring fullstack developer, exploring the world of web development.

As a child, problem-solving was both a challenge and triumph. Shaped by the hands of my parents (who subjected me to years of tutoring programs), I learned about the concept of independent learning. With little help on assignments, it became a skill of mine to decipher the issue, no matter how long it took or how many tears were shed out of frustration. The dopamine rush that accompanied each successive problem I solved became addictive, developing further as I entered high school and now college.

Coding has become, and remains, my grown-up version of those tutoring programs. With countless hours spent grappling with an issue, and the subsequent line of code that would resolve the said issue, the fixation I've had towards problem-solving has never motivated me more than it does now. This motivation has driven me to learn frontend development, and I am soon to delve into backend development, along with anything else that ignites my passion for critical thinking.
Projects
Demo Pokemart
A React-based mock shopping cart application, demonstrating proficiency in React concepts including routers, data fetching, states, side effects, and ContextAPI. Implemented seamless navigation between home and shop pages, integrated dynamic product display, and utilized PokeAPI for shop item retrieval. Ideas to add include payment screen and images of items on hover.
React Javascript CSS
PokeMemory Game
React web application that implements user-friendly interface comprising distinct sections for adding general information, educational background, and practical experience. The application is also integrated edit and submit functionalities for seamless user interaction, enabling users to modify and review entered data effortlessly.
React Javascript CSS
Resume App
React web application that implements user-friendly interface comprising distinct sections for adding general information, educational background, and practical experience. The application is also integrated edit and submit functionalities for seamless user interaction, enabling users to modify and review entered data effortlessly.
React Javascript CSS
Weather App
App designed to display a location's daily or hourly temperature and other forecast data from WeatherAPI. The app allows for different temperature units and has a unique frontend based on the current weather.
Javascript CSS WeatherAPI
Battleship
Web game that allows for players to compete against a computer in the game battleship. Logic and rules of battleship were built with javascript.
Javascript CSS
Knightmoves
Web app designed to implement early knowledge of data structures. Knightmoves can quickly calculate the least number of moves from a starting location to an end location. Built using javascript and an octree data structure
Javascript CSS
Text Based Pokemon Game
Python text-based game that includes many of the features from Pokemon. Ranging from battling, leveling up, and managing party members in the main menu, this game includes extracting data from a csv file in order to create attributes for its characters.
Python
